column5: These have probably been posted already, but these both got me really pumped up for this years pike and bass openers.  This will be my first year targeting both on the fly rod.  Does anyone recognize what kind of rod/reel this guy is using? Bass on the fly: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FlpVVKvrnu0   Watch how these Northerns stalk these long topwater flies, the jaws theme is always playing in my head Pike on the fly: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4NXj7tyJtto&feature=related  Hopefully I'll be able to post some of my own vids this year!!
Those are amazing videos ctranter. Thanks, they got me pumped too. Wow, those pike are huge
those were some sweet videos, thanks for sharing

Nice videos.  Thanks for linking them.   Never seen them before.   It was almost like watching an episode of Human Planet!  I don't really fly fish, but I do fish for pike with flies.   Tied a bunch recently and really looking forward to trying them out.  Cheers!
